message: walking out of the grocery store in florida and i m taking my mask off as i just walk out some old lady walking in looks at me and goes thought this was a free country just laughed at her go get your groceries and be quiet lady

The thing is, I'm a very proud rapper. I never had a problem with wearing a mask and i was going to ask if I should go in there and ask him if he should wear it. That would make me sad and he said I need to do the same.
